name: Ashun's NuNu Shack
description: GameFly no more!  This is an update of Ashun's Shacknews Chatty for the new new Shacknews.
additional_info:
Compatible with ChromeShack!

Change Log:

08/01/2018: Fixed linked fonts.
08/05/2016: Post expiration marker moved.
02/13/2015: ChromeShack 1.45 changes: postbox image uploader and live preview now work.
12/15/2014: Adapted to new ChromeShack features.
12/01/2014: Fixed the width-constrained chatty.
11/13/2014: What's happening to the chatty?! Temporary fix.
10/29/2014: Search pages fixed!
10/17/2014: Based on feedback, the refresh button is now much more prominent.
10/11/2014: Major changes to the arrangement of posts. Full integration with ChromeShack features. Shacknews no longer links the 'Latos' and 'Fjalla One' fonts, so I've had to include them in the CSS. Firefox doesn't allow this at all, and Chrome only allows this over http (NOT https). Trying to find a solution.
10/07/2014: TealGray Shack has taken over! A few color updates and fixed the header scrolling with the page. More changes to come soon.
09/23/2014: Slight update after bradsh and staymighty's design changes.
08/17/2014: LOLScript Drop-down menu is now styled.
08/11/2014: New ShackMessage icon. Lime icon replaces lightning bolt.
08/10/2014: Removed last vestiges of the NuShack design and chose consistent colors for links, active items, and mouseovers. Now marked as Public Domain. Use as you please!
07/17/2014: Overhauled the main page to increase legibility.
07/15/2014: CSS cleaned up and tree collapse working again!
07/12/2014: Large overhaul to achieve a consistent theme.  Better matches with the new article pages.
07/10/2014: Modified version of Ashun's Shacknews Chatty.
